title: Great experience
text: A hop skip and jump from hotel life if you are on a conference or just in the area for a visit. Wonderful servers. Great location. Fantastic food. There is a free shuttle service to ensure you get back safely.

title: Great
text: A great meal was had with steak,crab and stuffed mushrooms. Always great service with accommodating staff.

title: Perfect
text: Perfect location in Yale town close to all amenities and restaurants. Upon reception staff were extremely friendly and we enjoyed a complimentary glass of sparking wine. Night service had cold water and mood music on for when we returned. Would stay again for sure!

title: This location is a great place
text: This location is a great place to have lunch or dinner. It can be business or pleasure. Staff very attentive and the food is fab.

title: Great
text: Always get exactly what you ordered and how. Fresh, quality food. Servers are friendly and the chef got the meals out in a timely manner.

title: Peaceful
text: If you want to get away for the hustle and bustle for just one night stay here. Friendly staff, clean rooms and awesome service. Views are unbelievable. Walk the water or sit around and relax at the poolside. Try to pizza great for late night meal.

title: Awesome
text: This location is great for conferences or meetings. The staff were amazing. Always helpful and very friendly. Tons of parking. Clean updated rooms. The food that was served was very fresh. The restaurant has great food. Or just sit and relax in outdoor pool area.

title: Great
text: Such a great stay close to the water, beaches and pubs in the Penticton area. Fun and games if you have children. Business center available if you are in need. Staff are friendly abs the new tower has great new rooms.

title: Fast
text: Don’t forget to go to wing night Wednesday tasty and a variety for everyone. Great salads and get a refreshment to add to your experience.

title: Not the best
text: Stopped by to check out the bar and grill. Unusual and not very clean. The food wasn’t good at all. Would rethink.

title: Romantic
text: What a perfect spot to get away while still being close to Victoria and the surrounding areas. Get the room with the balcony with the hot tub over looking the ocean. Very clean. Friendly staff and welcomed with local cider was a treat.

title: Awesome
text: We had a fabulous time at this location. Awesome service with samples of mezcal that are worth the stop. Best Margo’s on the strip. Clean. Friendly staff. Music on weekends ! Open late.

title: Awesome
text: Great pizza and salad. Just loved the atmosphere being on the street. Great service and very friendly staff.

title: Inappropriate choose your spot carefully
text: We have been going here for many years and until now enjoyed. While relaxing at the beach bar resident surf instructor had his dog in the restaurant and he encouraged it to pee on the base of the umbrellas within steps of people eating and drinking. So caution if you aren’t wearing shoes while sitting at the beach tables you never know what you will find. I travel a lot and know caution should be used all the times but in this case it could be controlled in a more respectful manner.

title: Great
text:
Good menu with fresh vegetables, salads and noodles. Sit by the fire and warm up
With a specialty coffee.

title: Great location
text: This is a perfect location to take in the sites in downtown Vancouver. Reasonably priced. Close to the Sheraton if you are attending a conference. The staff in the lounge area are great! Try the spa. Good products friendly staff.

title: View
text: You have to take in the beautiful view of the Shuswap lake while relaxing over lunch or dinner. You can eat inside or out depending on the weather. Eagles, Osprey,Herons and many more exciting thing to watch.

title: Fun
text: If looking for a fun experience with great tasting food this is the place. Make sure you reserve as it's busy. Service at times did lag so you have to track down a server. All you can eat so can sample everything.

title: Not good service
text: Unfortunately the server was complaining about being busy with only 2 staff in and having to get food from the kitchen located on the other side of security. Blamed the kitchen for mix ups with other customers eggs ( not kitchen fault plates were served correctly by servers) and my plate had egg shells. Not cool when most of the customers flights were delayed and that's while we were here. Server tried to send others to Tim hortons. Lol there are lots of open tables not that busy. I was a server.

title: Lunch
text: A great place to grab lunch when down down. Inside all updated. Friendly staff. Support local. Noodle soup the best!
place: Namaste Authentic Indian Cuisine Salmon Arm
